register.description: This register controls the various parameters of the OCP interface

bitfield.description: Write 0's for future compatibility Reads returns 0
Write 0's for future compatibility Read returns 0
Software reset. [[br]]This bit is automatically reset by the hardware. [[br]]During reads, it always return 0

register.description: The interrupt status register has the status for each event that may be responsible for the generation of an interrupt to the corresponding user - write 1 to a given bit resets this bit. This register is mainly used for debug purpose.
